extendedInfo.description: Watch your Favorite High Quality Bengali Movies.!! Free..!!If you are looking to watch Bengali movies on your smart phone, This app is for you.It gives you quick access to pass time. This application has 300+ collection of Bengali Movies.Watch the latest and old Bengali Movies free App.Over 15 Categories of filter available Action & Arcade, Animation & Cartoons, Classics, Comedy, Crime, Drama, Documentary and Biography, Family, Foriegn Films, Horror, Mystery & Suspense, Romance, Science Fiction, Sports, Indian Cinemas, War Movies.Also Search using the direct name of the movie you want to watch and also search using Sort A-Z, Most Viewed, Most Popular, Top Rated, Published Date filters.Play both Low Definition and High Definition Videos.Please do leave your feedback. Enjoy!New movies to be added frequently, look out for frequent updates!Trouble Shooting:1. New movies to be added frequently, look out for frequent updates!2. Some users have experienced low quality movies. In such case choose high quality on start.3. If you have any issues viewing please email us.ISSUE : if high quality movie is not playing means that its not available, please play the low definition movie.DISCLAIMER: The content provided in this app is hosted by YouTube and is available in public domain. We do not upload any videos to YouTube. This app provides an organized way to browse and watch YouTube Videos.In order to give you a free app and keep developing more free apps in the future, we are integrating a search tool to our application.This will add a few access points to your device (hence the permissions) to direct you to the web search service.Please consider using the search to help us keep creating apps.You may delete the search icon, bookmark and homepage easily. Thank you.
